task.title: Adding default virtual backgrounds on Docker
task.shortdesc: By default, virtual background is enabled. You can choose which backgrounds are available to users by default. Depending on your business needs, you can customize the global library and prevent users from uploading custom background images. For more information, refer to .

taskbody.prereq: Ensure that all images are in JPG or GIF format.

step.cmd: Copy the image files into the sametime-config/web/virtual-background/custom directory.
Run docker-compose up -d command to apply all changes.

task.title: Removing default virtual backgrounds on Docker

context.p: Existing default background can be deleted from the global library.
